description: Non-material amendment to description of development of approved permission 4309/19 as amended by non-material application ref. 4309/19/28 (from: Demolition of all existing buildings including petrol filling station. Redevelopment of the site to provide a replacement food retail store (use class A1, now superseded by use class E), a series of apartment blocks ranging between 4 and 23 storeys in height  to provide residential units (use class C3), flexible use floorspace for commercial/community uses (within use classes A1/A2/A3/B1/D1, all now superseded by use classes F1,  F.2 and  E), a 3-form entry primary school (use class F.1), public open space, car and cycle parking, associated landscaping and infrastructure works, and provision of pedestrian and vehicular access). To read: Demolition of all existing buildings including petrol filling station. Redevelopment of the site to provide a replacement food retail store (use class E), a series of apartment blocks to provide residential units (use class C3), flexible use floorspace for commercial/community uses (within use classes F1,  F.2 and  E), public open space, car and cycle parking, associated landscaping and infrastructure works, and provision of pedestrian and vehicular access. Additional quantum condition (condition 88). (summary)
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall not exceed 23 storeys in height and a maximum of 1,280 dwellings.

Reason: To comply with the approved plans listed in Condition 2 and to maintain and appropriate scale of development.
